usage: Used for strength training, resistance exercises, and fitness workouts at home, in gyms, or in fitness classes.
key_features: Dumbbell hand weights for exercise and resistance training
Ideal for fitness classes, home gym, or workout area
Cast iron construction with neoprene coating for durability
Printed weight number on each end cap
Hexagonal shape prevents dumbbells from rolling away
ai_description: A pair of compact pink hexagonal dumbbells with a smooth matte neoprene coating rests on a white surface. Each end cap is clearly printed with the KAKSS brand and 1.5 KG weight in white, and the flat hex shape keeps them from rolling between uses.
target_audience: Home exercisers, fitness enthusiasts, and class participants looking for light fixed-weight dumbbells.
product_name: KAKSS Neoprene Workout Fixed Weight Dumbbell (3-Pound, Set Of 2pc)
